column4: those errors shouldn't affect the disc I think, does your LiveCD works?
all CDs I've tryed to work failed with io/errors somewhere at the end - the ubuntu image is a bit to long
try burning at slow rate; try adding -s 1 to burn at 1x, is the safest way to burn
$ wodim dev=/dev/cdrw driveropts=burnfree,noforcespeed fs=14M speed=2 -dao -eject -overburn -v <isofile>.iso is very safe too
